tool_description: Connect & Control Electric Vehicle Chargers from your application
name: eDRV EV Charging
title: eDRV EV Charging

api_list.name: postDrivers
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://edrv-ev-charging.p.rapidapi.com/v1/drivers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "edrv-ev-charging.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: remotestart
api_list.description: Use to request a remote start command. The request will wait for the charge station to process the command. It will timeout after 60 seconds.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://edrv-ev-charging.p.rapidapi.com/v1/commands/remotestart"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "edrv-ev-charging.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: unlockconnector

api_list.name: cancelreservation
api_list.description: Use to request a delete an existing reservation. The request will wait for the charge station to process the command. It will timeout after 60 seconds.
api_list.code:

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "edrv-ev-charging.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
